posts.description: Gluten-free chocolate mini bundt cakes with coconut caramel. Afternoon well spent! 😋✌️
Early birds catch the sunrise! 👩‍👧✌️ Let the boys sleep. 🙊

What else can we do with 5 kg organic bananas? Nana pops! 😋🍌✌️ They have frozen banana inside, then a layer of peanut butter, a layer of dark chocolate (>70% cacao) with various toppings ( dried raspberry, desiccated coconut, pistachio, toasted almond flakes and peanut butter drizzle! We are completely hooked! 😋😋😋 You can find the recipe on my blog (bio of @lumadeline). 👆#vegan #glutenfree #dairyfree
One of those places I wish to stay forever. 💦💙✨

This Sunday, we are going bananas with this vegan banana bread! 🍌🍌🍌 It is so soft and moist. And super easy to make!!! 🍞 Recipe is below. PS: can you spy a smiley 😊 in the picture? 👀

What you’ll need:
- 1/2 cup coconut oil, melted, plus more for pan - 2 cups all-purpose flour, plus more for pan - 2 tbsps ground flaxseed - 6 tbsps of filtered water
- 3/4 cup brown sugar - 1 tsp aluminum free baking soda - 1/4 teaspoon sea salt - 2 1/3 cups mashed very ripe bananas - 1 tsp pure vanilla extract
How it’s made:
1. Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a 9x5 inch loaf pan.
2. Mix ground flaxseed with filtered water. Let stand until slightly thickened, about 5 minutes. Stir to combine.
3. In a large bowl, combine flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together coconut oil and brown sugar. Stir in flaxseed mixture, vanilla extract and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir banana mixture into flour mixture; stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan.
4. Bake in preheated oven for 60 to 65 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack. Serve warm and enjoy!

Finally, we found "the tree of voices”of Pandora! 🌿🌒 And if we are really quiet, maybe we could hear the voices of our ancestors, too. 😜 PS: This is a very old banyan tree and the dangling vines are called aerial or adventitious prop roots. They help the tree to spread laterally by reaching the ground and then forming a new trunk. You can see more of this tree on my Instastories. 💫 #earthday #EarthDay2017 #whpnaturalbeauty
No better day to eat something green! Happy #earthday, everyone! 💚 🌎🌿 PS: these are the vegan donuts I made a while ago. You can find the recipe on archives part of my blog (link of @lumadeline). 😋

Standing at 10,023 feet (3,055 meter), watch the sun dancing over mount Haleakala (meaning "House of the sun", is the world's tallest stand alone mountain). 🌅Sunset is never the same again! 🙌 #whpnaturalbeauty #earthday
My happy place is where these three are! 👨🏽👧🏽👦🏽 Plus the beach and the ocean! 🌊🏝🤙#whpnaturalbeauty

See Maui for what it is! ⛰🏝This was taken during our helicopter tour with @maverickhelicopters last week. It was one of the most exciting and enjoyable experiences we ever had! The views were beyond describing in text, they are simply phenomenal. There were places like hidden valleys busting with waterfalls, rainforest draping the windward side of the island, and volcanic craters that tell the story of how these islands came together after millions years of eruptions. 🌋To witness it before your own eyes, a helicopter ride was definitely the way to go. 🚁 We stop giving the kids presents now and buy them experiences instead. They loved it! #maui #hawaii #lethawaiihappen
